strings.string: Please flip back to Landscape mode.

ARE YOU SURE YOU
WANT TO QUIT?
Perform a basic attack on a single opponent.
Do a far reaching swing that hits all enemies on screen.
Perform a deadly maneuver that strikes a single target.
Target a single opponent with the full power of both your blades.
Release all of your power in a single strike.
Target a single opponent with the full force of your staff.
Protect yourself from the full force of an opponent's blow.
Heal an ally a fraction of their maximum health.
Recieve all damage done to your team in their stead.
Intantly defeat a single target. Single use; consumes item upon use.
Freezes enemies for 5 turns. Single use; consumes item upon use.
50% chance to confuse each enemy on-screen. Consued enemies have 50% of attacking.
25% chance to stun each enemy on-screen.

Welcome to the Lair!
(CLICK to continue)

Welcome to the Lair!
(TAP to continue)
This is where you prepare between missions
When you're ready to fight, click "GO!" to start

During combat, every character gets a turn.
You select your action by pressing an action button.
Once an action is selected, it may be performed on a highlighted character
In addition to attacking you can defend yourself to recieve less damage. Once selected you can tap that character or press the icon again.
Each turtle also has a special ability only they have. These use AP (Action Points) so make sure to use them wisely!
You can use earned money to upgrade your lair, which will make your team stronger.
Purchasing the kitchen unlocks the ability to get pizza recipes to attract allies to your lair.
You can manage and outfit your team by clicking a teammate in your party.
Purchasing the zen garden will allow you to hone your skills, as well as increasing a turtle's strength.
You may also get other furniture around the lair to give boosts for your team, which can be upgraded to increase their effects.
In the pizza kitchen, you can cook up delicious recipes to attract new allies.

You've just gained a new ally!
Allies will appear around your lair, and can be selected to join your team.
Select your new ally now!
Here you can equip your team to prepare for the next battle using equipment you've found while fighting.

Equipment can be equipped by selecting a slot.
There are two types of equipment: Weapons, which focus on offense and gear, which help provide additional benefits.
Re-organizing the order of your team may also be done here, which affects the order your team fights in battle.

Each item has three main stats: Attack, Health Points, and Action Points. These will strenthen a character.
Most equipment has additional stats as well.
This is a miniboss. It's stronger than the average enemy.
Boss fight! This enemy is much tougher than others you've seen.
You've cleared the Sewer of bad guys! Let's continue to the next area.
You've cleared the Rooftops of bad guys! Let's continue to the next area.
You've cleared Shredder's Lair of bad guys! Let's continue to the next area.
You've cleared Dimension X of bad guys! Let's continue to the next area.
You've cleared away all the bad guys! But the fight is never over. You may continue the fight where you started with even stronger foes!
You can find new allies by purchasing wacky pizza flavors from the kitchen.
If you're having difficulty with enemies, upgrade your lair and visit the zen garden.
Equip your party! Defeated enemies drop equipment, which can be used back in your lair. You need to be well outfitted so you're a force to be reckoned with!
While weapons are important for dealing damage, don't forget to equip gear as well. Some gear even give you additional actions to use in battle.
Special moves offer unique abilities that can really make your team kick butt! But remember that they use AP, so use them wisely.
Some special actions can be used together in a great show of teamwork. Mikey and Leonardo know this better than anyone...
Favorite snack for late night reporting

Empower Raphael's "Limit Break" skill.
Also increases base Attack, HP, and AP.

Empower Mikey's "Chain Whirlwind" skill.
Also increases base Attack, HP, and AP.

Empower Leonardo's "X Slash" skill.
Also increases base Attack, HP, and AP.

Empower Donatello's "Cyclone Sweep" skill.
Also increases base Attack, HP, and AP.
Slightly raises HP, AP, and critical
Raises HP, AP, critical, evade speed, and gold
HP Regen (+5% of health per turn)
Critical Hit chance for whole team increased +2%
Prevents any attacks against user for 1 turn
Bonus to Attack, increase evade chance
50% chance to confuse each enemy on screen
AP Regen (+5% of AP per turn rounded)
25% chance to freeze each enemy on screen for 1 turn

Extra hard to inflict damage
An ally may have a special use for this.
Rare, consumes upon use - Freezes enemies for 5 turns
HP Regen (+8% of health per turn)
Distracts enemies causing them to miss more often
